Benefits.title: Features & Benefits
Benefits.subtitle: Captivating card motifs and heartfelt messages for your greetings.

body.title: Media Catalog
body.bodyText: Pick an event and you will have many options of beautiful images and text to choose from and have them on your Greeting Card.

body.title: Card Editor
body.bodyText: Create and Edit your Greeting Cards. Add text, change the cover picture. You can check the Preview of the card you have just created!

body.title: Card Roulette
body.bodyText: A Greeting Card on the go, try your luck at the Card Roulette! Now there is no excuse for a Greeting!.

body.title: Contacts
body.bodyText: Save your contacts to benefit from the automatic sending of greetings! Never miss a birthday greeting again!
